dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1,632 km² annotated images data at 50 cm/px from southeast Asian regions, used for training road segmentation algorithms.

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 405 km² of labeled image data at 20 cm/px from the USA and Austria, used for training building segmentation algorithms.

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 10,050 annotated persons in 311 aerial and drone images covering various scenarios and countries, used for training person detection algorithms.
